predicate.note: Frames file for 'dignify' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: give worth to

example.name: arg2 as sentence
example.text: ``I hate [*-1] to dignify the publication by commenting on the obscene rating,'' Mayor Carolyn Robinson says, adding that cities have no way to rebut the book.

roleset.note: More commonly arg2 is an NP: 'I won't dignify that with a response.'
